A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A really great movie with some of the best sci fi action scenes ever. Unfortunately\, it feels like it suffers a little from Transformer-itis. After 2.5 hours of non-stop explosions and way too many sub-plots and secondary characters\, the movie feels a bit bloated and about a half hour too long. That being said\, I think its the best of the newer movies they've made.
